channel.title: Posting all my questions on this topic need lots of help im inexped @ servers
channel.description: 1. how do i add the actual server to the server status. 2. i have no-ip and i did the port forwarding yet im still confused. 3. i keep having the same problem with my server it is always considered by mopar, offline 4. if any1 can help me host it E-mail me @ zerocomfor@yahoo.com i cnot im cuz i cnt dl messanger. ok there are my problems i am doing just as you ppl have said so if you need pics ill add just help me cuz i so want a server :) [br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 26, 2009, 07:52:21 pm[/size][hr]plz post sumthin

item.title: Posting all my questions on this topic need lots of help im inexped @ servers
item.dc:creator: @Sokid Sokid
item.description:
@Sokid wrote:

1.) If you are talking about moparscape.com/serverstatus.php go to this link: http://moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?action=register and register your server. Just add some pictures, information, your IP, and port. That is all you need (besides a good password).

2.) You have No-Ip so did you make your server IP yet? All you need to do is forward the point period. Nothing else about that.

3.) Do you actually have the server running? It may be having problems recognizing your server.

4.) Number 4 isnâ€™t a question so therefore it does not need an answer.

Read full topic
item.source: Posting all my questions on this topic need lots of help im inexped @ servers
